epp:phrases.epp:phrase: RCUK Open Access mandate for journal articles

epp:phrase.p: If this work has been funded in part or wholly by:

ul.li: RCUK (policy - PDF), and is a journal article being submitted for publication from 1st April 2013,

epp:phrase.p: You are required to provide an Open Access version of the work either on the publisher website or to upload one in .
Use SHERPA/FACT to check the journal's archiving policy and its compliance with your funder's Open Access requirement.

dl.dd: Upload the version that includes peer reviewed corrections. This is usually the author's final manuscript; upload immediately it is accepted for publication so that you comply with the REF. staff will set an embargo, or lock access, if required by the journal.
